actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Frances Silver.

summary.text: Deems a named individual to have been married to a former U.S. Post Office employee for a specified period for purposes of determining her survivor annuity eligibility. Requires the Director of the Office of Personnel Management to pay such individual a lump sum annuity payment equal to the amount she would have received had she been entitled to a survivor annuity as of a specified date.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Frances Silver.
